title: Quiet the Nose (Derek Lewis, Pinky Cole & Derrick Hayes)
itunes:title: Quiet the Nose (Derek Lewis, Pinky Cole & Derrick Hayes)
description:
Today on the show we had Derek Lewis, Pinky Cole & Derrick Hayes stop by and speak on HBCUs, Black Business Initiatives, Community and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to everyone that was upset for Amanda Seales character in Insecure for wearing the AKA sorrority colors because she is not one. In fact we opened up the phonelines after to see if any of our listeners in a fraternity or sorority in a uproar over it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Derek Lewis, Pinky Cole & Derrick Hayes stop by and speak on HBCUs, Black Business Initiatives, Community and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to everyone that was upset for Amanda Seales character in Insecure for wearing the AKA sorrority colors because she is not one. In fact we opened up the phonelines after to see if any of our listeners in a fraternity or sorority in a uproar over it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
